sentences.english: A mineralizing model of Yangshan gold deposit is therefore established on this basis.
sentences.chinese: 在此基础上提出了阳山金矿床的成矿模式。

sentences.english: The Yangshan gold deposit is located in Wenxian, Gansu Province.
sentences.chinese: 阳山金矿床位于甘肃省文县。

sentences.english: Yangshan Au deposit is an unexploited giant deposit.
sentences.chinese: 阳山金矿床为一尚未开发的特大型金矿床。

sentences.english: The anuual capacity of"Weiyangshan"high quality cement is 2 Million ton.
sentences.chinese: 年生产“蔚阳山”牌高标号水泥200万吨。

sentences.english: For more information, please fill out the form below.
sentences.chinese: 如需更多太阳山别墅资料，请与我们联系。

sentences.english: Mount Yueyang locates between Zichuan and Boshan.
sentences.chinese: 岳阳山位于淄川区和博山区的交界处。
